name: Sheep go to Heaven
description:
Sheep go to heaven, Goats go to hell.

Things are getting busy in the queue for the afterlife. Luckily we've invested in the "sort-o-matic", a machine capable of sorting those meant for heaven from those meant for hell.

~ Gameplay ~

Wait for the conveyor belt to roll the animal into the machine, and then press [up] to send it to heaven or [down] to send it to hell.

When you see an animal for the first time, you'll be shown an introduction telling you if they've been good or bad and where their final destination should be.

Stay quick- if the conveyor belt fills up you'll lose your lives. Every time you send an animal to the wrong destination, you'll also lose a life. Once you've lost all your lives you'll see your final score.

Good luck getting the highest score you can!
